title: The Beauty Within
description: Resigned to a life of taking care of her spoiled younger sister and doing everything her demanding father decrees, Jana's long passed the point of wishing for a loving family of her own. Besides, what man in his right mind would want a disfigured woman?Danâ€™s serving out a ten-year probation working on the Rocky Basin Ranch. His dreams of owning his own spread keep him going when all seems hopeless. Then Jana, with her bright eyes, beautiful smile, tender nature and gentle touch, enters his life, offering him one night of shared comfort. But his heart demands forever.
author: Anna Leigh Keaton
